title: Oxfordshire Live: Friday 5 May - BBC News
summary: votes being counted for all 63 seats on oxfordshire county council .
latest tally : lib dems 5 ( +2 ) ; conservatives 12 ( no change ) ; labour 8 ( -1 ) ; green 0 ( -1 ) ; and independents 2 ( no change ) .
oxfordshire county council deputy leader loses seat to lib dems .

documents.title: local elections 2017 : the results mapped
text: local elections 2017 : the results mapped

documents.title: that 's all for today
text: thanks for reading today .
we 'll be back tomorrow with more news , sport , weather and travel from across oxfordshire from 08:00 .

documents.title: man assaulted with knife in banbury
text: between midday and 13:00 on tuesday a 21-year-old local man was chased up and down a driveway in withycombe drive by a number of males who were believed to be in possession of a knife .
the offenders were seen arriving in the area in a grey renault laguna .
after a short chase , the victim was assaulted outside a property in withycombe drive on a driveway by the offenders using a knife .
he received superficial injuries to his chest and back that required hospital treatment .
two men have been arrested on sus of gbh , a 28-year-old from cropredy , who has been released on bail , and a 19-year-old man from banbury , who is in custody .

documents.title: chip shop portraits exhibition launched
text: kazem hakimi , from oxford , became an internet hit after taking of his customers and has launched two exhibitions of his work .

documents.title: portraits from a chip shop opens in oxford
text: an oxford fish and chip shop owner who took of his customers as a hobby has had two exhibitions of his work open up in the city .
kazem hakimi went viral in july when the bbc published a video of his project cataloguing the varied characters who visited his iffley road premises .
the portraits are being shown at the old fire station and modern art oxford .
mr hakimi said he was `` extremely happy '' and `` never imagined this would happen '' .
author: Dave Gilyeat
BBC South

documents.title: this week 's review
text: james luxford from the radio times joins howard bentham to review the new british comedy mindhorn .

documents.title: tories miss majority by one seat
text: tories miss majority by one seat

documents.title: hollywood a-listers in oxford as filming trucks roll in
text: you may have noticed something of a buzz in oxford this morning , with hollywood a-lister emma stone among the stars filming in the city .
author: Oxford Mail

documents.title: referendum on headington development
text: residents in headington have taken part in a referendum on oxford city council 's neighbourhood development plan for the area .
to the question on whether they wanted the authority to use the plan to help it decide planning applications , 3,310 voted yes , and 543 voted no .
there was a 38 % turnout .

documents.title: former council leader reacts
text: the council leader up to the election , ian hudspeth , has been reacting to today 's result .

`` here in oxfordshire it 's looking a little tighter than i 'd actually like obviously overnight , nationally , it 's been very good for the conservative party , but that has n't been reflected here in oxfordshire , '' he told us .
with no overall control serious decisions had to be taken over whether the party would try to run the council with a minority or make a deal , he added .
it 's all up for play .

documents.title: final tally
text: the lib dems have won wheatley , leaving the makeup of the council :
conservatives 31
labour 14
lib dems 13
independents 4
henley residents group 1

documents.title: breakingtories miss out on oxfordshire majority
text: all the results are in - the conservatives have missed out on a majority on @ twitterid by 1 seat .
# localelections2017
they need not worry ; the @ twitterid will soon step up to support them .
again !
do we have any stats on the cowley area ?

documents.title: one to go
text: one more seat to go - the tories are on 31 seats , one seat short of 32 majority .
quite a safe lib dem seat left to declare

documents.title: tories lose henley
text: the henley-on-thames seat has flipped from the conservatives to henley residents group , with 1,747 to 1,362 votes .

documents.title: council leader keeps seat
text: conservative council leader ian hudspeth has held his woodstock seat and seen off the lib dem challenger , 1,694 votes to 1,348 .

documents.title: turnout up
text: the overall turnout for yesterday 's election was 33 % , up from 30 % in 2013 .

documents.title: lib dem holdfrom reporter at the count
text: banbury general election candidate for the lib dems john howson has held onto st margaret 's by about 100 votes .
there were cheers when the result was announced , and relief that second place labour had n't stolen the seat .
author: Joe Nimmo
BBC South

documents.title: tories close to oxfordshire majority
text: the conservatives are 3 seats away from winning a majority in oxfordshire .
it really is down to the wire # localelections17

documents.title: travel update : accident on a34 northbound
text: we 're hearing about big issues with the a34 .
if you 're heading northbound it 's closed at hinksey hill because of a three-car accident .
there are diversions there but big queues .
it 's slow from halfway back to the milton interchange .

documents.title: council leader holds onto seat
text: conservative council leader ian hudspeth has held onto his woodstock seat and seen off the lib dem challenger , 1,694 votes to 1,348 .
author: Joe Nimmo
BBC South

documents.title: latest tally
text: no seats have changed hands in about an hour .
the current tally is lib dems 6 ( +2 ) , labour 12 ( -1 ) , conservatives 19 ( no change ) , green 0 ( -1 ) , and independents 3 ( no change ) .
author: Joe Nimmo
BBC South

documents.title: labour holdbbc oxford political reporter tweets
text: big hold for labour in witney south and central .
last time laura price won by just 10 votes .
this time more than 120 # localelections17

documents.title: latest tally
text: we 've had a series of seats that have n't changed hands , putting the current tally on lib dems 5 ( +2 ) , labour 8 ( -1 ) , conservatives 12 ( no change ) , green 0 ( -1 ) , and independents 2 ( no change ) .
author: Joe Nimmo
BBC South

documents.title: labour win
text: the labour party has just up its first seat , iffley fields and st marys , from the greens by about 200 votes .
could this be a result of jeremy corbyn 's leadership ?
author: Joe Nimmo
BBC South

documents.title: seats changing hands
text: so far we 've had four seats change hands ; the conservatives have taken two from labour , and the lib dems have taken two from the tories .
if that trend continues the lib dems could be on course to become the county 's biggest opposition party .
author: Joe Nimmo
BBC South

documents.title: lib dem gain in abingdonfrom our reporter at the count
text: a huge cheer just went up here in abingdon as the lib dems gained the marginal seat of abingdon north from the conservatives - 2,029 votes to 1,494 .
author: Joe Nimmo
BBC South

documents.title: abingdon north votes lib dem
text: result - abingdon north - emily jane smith - liberal democrat # oxonvote17

documents.title: oxfordshire county election results
text: things are looking very close .
the lib dems have gained two seats , including deptuy rodney rose 's , while the conservatives have gained two seats in banbury .
author: Bethan Phillips
Political reporter, BBC Radio Oxford

documents.title: breakingdeputy loses seatelection results are beginning to come in
text: in the first surprise of the day oxfordshire 's deputy council leader rodney rose has lost his charlbury and wychwood seat to lib dem liz leffman .
the final vote tally was :
lib dems - 2,105
conservatives - 1,572

documents.title: girl , 13 , injured after man throws object from car
text: a 13-year-old girl had to be treated in hospital after a man who threw a can from a car at her face .
it happened on wednesday between 18:10 and 18:20 on sandford road , while she was walking towards sandford on thames .
the can was thrown from a small silver car with blacked out windows which drove past .
she sustained minor facial injuries and attended hospital for treatment , thames valley police said .
the offender is described as white and in his 20s .
pc jordan mcclay said : `` this has been a distressing incident for the victim , and resulted in her needing hospital treatment .
`` i would like to speak to anyone who has any details relating to this .
i believe there was another vehicle travelling behind the suspect 's car , and i would like to speak to the occupants of that vehicle , as they could have vital information . ''

documents.title: ready , steady , go
text: counting has started in the oxfordshire local elections
getting ready to start !
# oxonvote17
your ballot papers sitting patiently waiting to be counted from 10am !
results as they come in at # oxonvote17
them plastic cable ties will definitely stop the corruption ; )

documents.title: dna helps convict man of 1986 oxford attempted rape
text: a serial child abuser has been found guilty of the attempted rape of a 13-year-old girl 31 years ago after new dna evidence was discovered .
philip spriggs , 52 , formerly of oxford , attacked his victim on 30 january 1986 as she was walking near pullens lane in oxford .
he pulled his victim to the ground and threatened her before she escaped .
in 2015 spriggs was jailed for 17 years for a string of sex offences against two children .
author: Joe Nimmo
BBC South

documents.title: counting due to begin
text: counting is set to get underway shortly for the @ twitterid elections - coverage all day on @ twitterid

documents.title: travel update : oxford city centre delays
text: there are delays into the city centre along marsh lane , woodstock road , banbury road , botley road , donnington bridge , the slade , and horspath driftway .
author: Al Ryan
BBC Oxford travel presenter

documents.title: labour wins barton and sandhills ward by-election
text: we have one result to bring on the barton and sandhills by-election .
labour 's mark ladbrooke has been elected following the death of councillor van coulter .
there are nearly 2,400 posts being contested in england .
registered voters were able to cast their ballots until 22:00 bst on thursday .

documents.title: good morning
text: hello and welcome to bbc local live for oxfordshire on friday 5 may .
we 'll be bringing you the latest news as it breaks across the county , including the results of the local elections .
counting in oxfordshire starts at 10:00 .
you can be part of the conversation via email , twitter , or facebook .
many thanks to graham wright for today 's main image , which he has called `` springtime in youlbury wood '' .
you can share your with us at oxfordshire @ bbc.co.uk .
